languages.text: {n}Не сумев до конца разобраться в конструкции сервитора, вы почти наугад выбираете выглядящий сгоревшим {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} и отсекаете его от остальной системы. В то же мгновение из глубин плоти сервитора доносится шипение. Отчетливо тянет жженым мясом и паленой проводкой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Не сумев до конца разобраться в конструкции сервитора, вы почти наугад выбираете выглядящий сгоревшим когитатор и отсекаете его от остальной системы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}After failing to fully understand the servitor's design, you pick a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} pretty much at random, one that looks busted, and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Не сумев до конца разобраться в конструкции сервитора, вы почти наугад выбираете выглядящий сгоревшим {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} и отсекаете его от остальной системы. В то же мгновение из глубин плоти сервитора доносится шипение. Отчетливо тянет жженым мясом и паленой проводкой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unable to get a thorough understanding of the design of the Servitor, you pick a cogitator that looks busted pretty much at random and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the Servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}

{n}Unable to get a thorough understanding of the design of the Servitor, you pick a cogitator that looks busted pretty much at random and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the Servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}

{n}Unable to get a thorough understanding of the design of the servitor, you pick a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} pretty much at random, one that looks busted, and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}

{n}Unable to get a thorough understanding of the design of the servitor, you pick a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} pretty much at random, one that looks busted, and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}

{n}After failing to fully understand the servitor's design, you pick a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} pretty much at random, one that looks busted, and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}

{n}After failing to fully understand the servitor's design, you pick a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} pretty much at random, one that looks busted, and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你并没有完全理解机仆的设计，仅仅是随意挑选了一个看起来似乎损坏的{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}，切断了它与系统其他部分的连接。随后，你听到了机仆肉体深处传来了嘶嘶的声音，闻到了肉体与电线烧焦的味道。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After failing to fully understand the servitor's design, you pick a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} pretty much at random, one that looks busted, and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你并没有完全理解奴工的设计，仅仅是随意挑选了一个看起来似乎损坏的{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}，切断了它与系统其他部分的连接。随后，你听到了奴工肉体深处传来了嘶嘶的声音，闻到了肉体与电线烧焦的味道。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al no entender completamente el diseño del servidor, eliges un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} al azar que parece estar roto y lo cortas del resto del sistema. Al instante oyes un siseo del interior de la carne del servidor. Te llega el olor de carne chamuscada y cables quemados.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After failing to fully understand the servitor's design, you pick a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} pretty much at random, one that looks busted, and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al no entender completamente el diseño del servidor, eliges un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} al azar que parece estar roto y lo cortas del resto del sistema. Al instante oyes un siseo del interior de la carne del servidor. Te llega el olor de carne chamuscada y cables quemados.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターの設計をしっかり理解できなかったため、適当に壊れていそうな{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}を選んで機械の他の部分と切り離す。とたんに、サーヴィターの肉体の奥底からシューシューと音があがる。焦げた肉と焼けた配線のほのかな香りが上がった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After failing to fully understand the servitor's design, you pick a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} pretty much at random, one that looks busted, and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターの設計をしっかり理解できなかったため、適当に壊れていそうな{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}を選んで機械の他の部分と切り離す。とたんに、サーヴィターの肉体の奥底からシューシューと音があがる。焦げた肉と焼けた配線のほのかな香りが上がった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als es dir nicht gelingt, den Aufbau des Servitors vollständig zu verstehen, wählst du mehr oder weniger zufällig einen {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} aus, der defekt aussieht, und trennst ihn vom Rest des Systems. Sofort hörst du ein Zischen tief aus dem Inneren des Fleischs des Servitors. Es riecht nach verbranntem Fleisch und durchgeschmorten Kabeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After failing to fully understand the servitor's design, you pick a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} pretty much at random, one that looks busted, and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als es dir nicht gelingt, den Aufbau des Servitors vollständig zu verstehen, wählst du mehr oder weniger zufällig einen {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} aus, der defekt aussieht, und trennst ihn vom Rest des Systems. Sofort hörst du ein Zischen tief aus dem Inneren des Fleischs des Servitors. Es riecht nach verbranntem Fleisch und durchgeschmorten Kabeln.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après avoir échoué à comprendre pleinement le fonctionnement du servitor, vous choisissez plus ou moins au hasard un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} en piteux état et vous le coupez du reste du système. Un grésillement s'élève alors immédiatement de l'intérieur du servitor, tandis qu'une odeur de chair brûlée et de câbles fondus parvient à vos narines.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After failing to fully understand the servitor's design, you pick a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} pretty much at random, one that looks busted, and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir échoué à comprendre pleinement le fonctionnement du servitor, vous choisissez plus ou moins au hasard un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} en piteux état et vous le coupez du reste du système. Un grésillement s'élève alors immédiatement de l'intérieur du servitor, tandis qu'une odeur de chair brûlée et de câbles fondus parvient à vos narines.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmetörün tasarımını tam olarak anlayamayınca rastgele, bozuk görünen bir {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g} seçiyor ve sistemin geri kalanından ayırıyorsun. Hizmetörün bedeninin içinden o anda bir tıslama çıkıyor. Burnuna yanmış et ve kablo kokusu geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After failing to fully understand the servitor's design, you pick a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} pretty much at random, one that looks busted, and cut it off from the rest of the system. Immediately, you hear hissing coming from deep inside the servitor's flesh. You catch a whiff of charred meat and burnt wiring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Servitörün tasarımını tam olarak anlayamayınca rastgele, bozuk görünen bir {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g} seçiyor ve sistemin geri kalanından ayırıyorsun. Servitörün bedeninin içinden o anda bir tıslama çıkıyor. Burnuna yanmış et ve kablo kokusu geliyor.{/n}
